awards.text: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.

fullplot: A rookie firefighter tries to earn the respect of his older brother and other firefighters while taking part in an investigation of a string of arson/murders. This detailed look into the duties and private lives of firemen naturally features widespread pyrotechnics and special effects.
plot: Two Chicago firefighter brothers who don't get along have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.
title: Backdraft

tomatoes.consensus: It's not particularly deep, but Backdraft is a strong action movie with exceptional special effects.
